name: Stop Santa - Tower Defense
description: Take the War on Christmas all the way to the North Pole! Santa has gone crazy and enlisted an army of evil elves, zombie Santas, and sadistic penguins. It's now up to you and the remaining elves to Stop Santa in this holiday themed tower defense game!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i5 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel Integrated Storage: 220 MB available space
